sections.title: Integrat\b\tn \tf a \fult\bl\bngual Keyw\trd Extract\tr \bn a D\tcument \fanagement System Andrea Ag\bl\b* , \farc\t Fabbr\b* , Alessandr\t Panunz\b+ , \fanuel Z\bn\b*
paragraphs: E-mail:\bandrea.agili@drwolf.it,\bmarco.fabbri@drwolf.it,\bale\t\tandro.panunzi@unifi.it,\bmlzini@drwolf.it\b Abstract In\bthi\t\bpaper\bwe\bpre\tent\ba\bnew\bDocument\bManagement\bSy\ttem\bcalled\bDrStorage.\bThi\t\bDMS\bi\t\bmulti-platform,\bJCR-170\bcompliant,\b \tupport\t\bWebDav,\bver\tioning,\bu\ter\bauthentication\band\bauthorization\band\bthe\bmo\tt\bwide\tpread\bfile\bformat\t\b(Adobe\bPDF,\bMicro\toft\bOffice,\b HTML,...).\b It\b i\t\b al\to\b ea\ty\b to\b cu\ttomize\b in\b order\b to\b enhance\b it\t\b \tearch\b capabilitie\t\b and\b to\b \tupport\b automatic\b metadata\b a\t\tignment.\b DrStorage\bha\t\bbeen\bintegrated\bwith\ban\bautomatic\blanguage\bgue\t\ter\band\bwith\ban\bautomatic\bkeyword\bextractor:\bthe\te\bmetadata\bcan\bbe\b a\t\tigned\bautomatically\bto\bdocument\t,\bbecau\te\bthe\bDrStorage'\t\b\terver\bpart\bha\t\bbenn\bmodified\bto\ballow\bthat\bmetadata\ba\t\tignment\btake\t\b place\ba\t\bdocument\t\bare\bput\bin\bthe\brepo\titory.\bMetadata\bcan\bgreatly\bimprove\bthe\b\tearch\bcapabilite\t\band\bthe\bre\tult\t\bquality\bof\ba\b\tearch\b engine.\bDrStorage'\t\bclient\bha\t\bbeen\bcu\ttomized\bwith\btwo\b\tearch\bre\tult\t\bview:\bthe\bfir\tt,\bcalled\btimeline\bview,\b\thow\t\btemporal\btrend\t\bof\b querie\t\ba\t\ban\bhi\ttogram,\bthe\b\tecond,\bkeyword\bcloud,\b\thow\t\bwhich\bword\t\bare\bcorrelated\band\bhow\bmuch\bare\bcorrelated\bwith\bthe\bre\tult\t\bof\ba\b particular\bday.\b \b \b

sections.title: 1. D\tcument Search Pr\tblem
paragraphs: It\b i\t\b common\b experience\b to\b \ttore\b lot\t\b of\b heterogeneou\t\b document\t\bin\bvariou\t\bfolder\t\bon\ba\blocal\bhard\bdi\tk\bor\bin\ba\b network\b file\b \ty\ttem.\b Then,\b after\b \tome\b time,\b it\b i\t\b al\to\b common\b to\b have\b the\b need\b to\b retrieve\b \tome\b of\b tho\te\b document\t,\bbut\bnot\bto\bremember\bwhich\btheir\blocation\bwa\t.\b It\b i\t\b al\to\b a\b common\b need\b to\b a\t\tign\b metadata\b to\b \ttored\b document\t.\bMetadata\bgenerally\bprovide\bu\teful\binformation\b and\bare\bu\ted\bto\bobtain\bbetter\b\tearch\bre\tult\t.\bThe\bdrawback\b i\t\b that\b the\b manual\b metadata\b a\t\tignment\b i\t\b a\b boring\band\b error\bprone\bta\tk,\b\to\bautomatic\bmetadata\ba\t\tignment\bwould\b be\ba\bgreat\bbenefit.\b The\bmarket\bha\t\b\tupplied\b\teveral\band\bvariou\t\btool\t\bwhich\b help\bin\bdocument\t\b\tearching.\bSome\bof\bthem\bare\bvery\brough\b (e.g.\b MS\b Window\t\b \tearch\b into\b file),\b other\b are\b more\b \tophi\tticated\b (Google\b De\tktop,\b MS\b Window\t\b De\tktop\b Search,\bBeagle,\bSpotlight,\bStrigi...).\b\b Anyway,\bthey\black\b\tome\bfeature\t\bthat\bmay\bimprove\bquery\b re\tult\t\brelevance.\b Fir\tt\b of\b all,\b they\b generally\b treat\b document\t\b (file\t,\b email,\b web\bhi\ttorie\t\bor\bwhatever)\ba\t\bthey\bare,\b\to\bit'\t\bnot\bpo\t\tible\b to\b a\t\tign\b metadata\b and,\b con\tequentially,\b it'\t\b neither\b po\t\tible\b to\b \tearch\b on\b them,\b nor\b to\b u\te\b them\b for\b re\tult\t\b ranking.\b Moreover,\bthey\bare\bde\tigned\bto\bwork\bon\ba\b\tingle\bmachine,\b they\bdon't\b\tupport\bdocument\t\b\tharing\band\bit\bi\t\bnot\bea\ty\bto\b \tearch\b on\b them\b from\b variou\t\b ho\tt\t\b in\b a\b net\b (Beagle\b \tupport\t\bNFS,\bbut\bindexe\t\bare\b\ttored\bon\ba\b\tingle\bmachine\b and\b\tearche\t\bare\bpo\t\tible\bfrom\bthat\bmachine\bonly).\b

sections.title: 2. D\tcument \fanagement Systems
paragraphs: To\baddre\t\t\bthi\t\bkind\bof\bproblem\t\ba\bnew\bkind\bof\b\toftware\b ha\t\b been\b developed:\b Document\b Management\b Sy\ttem\t\b (DMS).\bA\btypical\bDMS\bi\t\bcapable\bto:\b -\b manage\b a\b network\b repo\titory\b allowing\b u\ter\t\b to\b \ttore\b document\t\b via\b a\b number\b of\b way\b (Server\b Me\t\tage\b Block\b SMB,\bWebDAV,\bdedicated\bclient\t,\b...);\b -\b automatically\b extract\b low\b level\b metadata\b (\tize,\b time\ttamp\t,...)\band\bthe\btext\bfrom\ba\bever\bgrowing\bnumber\bof\b document\b format\t\b (MS\b Office,\b Adobe\b PDF,\b HTML,\b XML,...);\b -\b\ttore\band\bindex\bdocument\t,\bmetadata\band\btext\t;\b -\bmake\bquerie\t\bon\bdocument\t\bcontent\t\band\bmetadata;\b -\bmanage\bu\ter,\bauthentication,\brole\t,\bauthorization\t.\b Some\b of\b them\b are\b al\to\b capable\b to\b do\b ver\tioning\b and\bto\b create\band\bapply\bworkflow\bon\bdocument\t.\b In\bthi\t\bpaper\bwe\bare\bgoing\bto\bpre\tent\ba\bnew\bDMS,\bcalled\b DrStorage,\b which\b feature\t\b all\b the\b above\b mentioned\b capabilitie\t,\b but\b al\to\b allow\t\b integration\b with\b lingui\ttic\b technologie\t\bin\border\bto\bautomatically\bextract\band\ba\t\tign\b metadata\bfrom\bin\terted\bdocument\t.\b

sections.title: 3. DrSt\trage
paragraphs: DrStorage\b i\t\b a\b DMS\b written\b entirely\b in\b Java,\b \to\b it\bi\t\b natively\b multiplatform\b (run\t\b \tmoothly\b on\b MS\b Window\t,\b GNU/Linux\bor\bMac\bOS\bX\b\ty\ttem\t).\bIt\bi\t\bba\ted\bon\bthe\bopen\b \tource\b project\b JLibrary,\b but\b it\b ha\t\b been\b reengineered\b in\b order\bto\bbe\bea\tily\bexten\tible\bin\b\tearching\bcapabilitie\t,\bbut\b al\to\bto\bcreate\bclient\t\bapplication\t\bwith\bcu\ttomizable\b\tearch\b feature\band\bre\tult\bview\t.\bJLibrary,\bin\bturn,\bexploit\t\bApache\b Jackrabbit\bwhich\bi\t\ba\bfully\bconforming\bimplementation\bof\b the\bContent\bRepo\titory\bfor\bJava\bTechnology\bAPI\b(JCR).\b Among\bthe\bmain\bfeature\t\bof\bDrStorage\bare:\b -\bcompliance\bwith\bJSR-170,\bthe\bJava\bStandard\bReque\tt\bfor\b Content\bRepo\titory;\b -\b\tupport\bfor\bWebDAV;\b -\b\tupport\bfor\bediting\blot\t\bof\bdocument\t\bformat\t\b\tuch\ba\t\bMS\b Office\bformat\t,\bAdobe\bPDF,\bHTML,\bplain\btext;\b -\bdocument\t\bver\tioning;\b -\b \tupport\b for\b high-level\b metadata\b \tuch\b a\t\b language,\b keyword\t,\bcategorie\t.\b

sections.title: 4. Search techn\bques
paragraphs: Searching\bon\bfull\btext\bindexe\t\bi\t\ba\bmature\band\blargely\bu\ted\b feature\band\bit\t\bimplementation\bcan\bbe\bfound\bin\bhundred\t\bof\b de\tktop\b application\t\b and\b \tearch\b engine\t.\b Many\b kind\t\b of\b querie\t\bhave\bbeen\bdeveloped\band\bare\bpre\tent\ba\t\bfeature\t\bin\b \teveral\b application\t:\b boolean\b querie\t,\b range\b querie\t\b (e.g.\b u\ting\bdate\band\btime\bvalue\t),\bfuzzy\bquerie\t\b(e.g.\bGoogle’\t\b ‘Did\byou\bmean...’),\bproximity\bquerie\t,\bregular\bexpre\t\tion\b querie\t.\bIt\bcan\bbe\b\ttated\bthat\bthe\bproblem\bof\bretrieving\ba\b\tet\b of\bdocument\t,\bgiven\ba\bquery,\bhave\bbeen\b\tolved\bmany\byear\t\b

ago\band\bthe\b\tolution\bi\t\blargely\badopted.\bWhat\bit'\t\balready\b far\bfrom\bbeing\bachieved\bi\t\bto\bget\bwhat\bit'\t\bmore\bimportant\b at\b the\b top\b of\b the\b re\tult\t\b li\tt.\b In\b other\b word\t,\b what'\t\b now\b really\bintere\tting\bi\t\bto\brank\bre\tult\t,\bnot\bmerely\bto\bget\bthem.\b Many\b technique\t\b have\b been\b developed\b to\b obtain\b better\b ranking\t:\bfor\bthe\bweb\bdocument\t\bthat\bare\blinked\bon\bthe\bnet,\b Page\bRank\bi\t\bone\bof\bthe\bmo\tt\bfamou\t.\bFor\btext\t,\bkeyword\t\b can\bbe\bcon\tidered\ba\bvalid\b\tupport:\bthe\bba\tic\bidea\bi\t\bthat\bif\ba\b word\b in\b a\b query\b i\t\b al\to\b a\b document\b keyword,\b then\b that\b document\b\thould\breceive\ba\bhigh\brank,\bbecau\te\bthe\bkeyword\b i\t\ba\bhighly\bde\tcriptive\bword\bof\bthe\bdocument\bcontent.\b Obviou\tly,\bfor\ba\blarge\bamount\bof\bdocument\t,\bthi\t\bapproach\b i\t\bfea\tible\bonly\bif\bthe\bkeyword\bextraction\bproce\t\t\bcan\bbe\b done\bautomatically.\b\b

sections.title: 5. Implementat\b\tn features
paragraphs: DrStorage\b implement\t\b a\b multilingual\b keyword\b extractor\b developed\b by\b LABLITA\b (Italian\b Department,\b Univer\tity\b of\b Florence)\b (Panunzi,\b Fabbri,\b Moneglia,\b 2005).\b The\b algorithm\bbehind\bthe\bimplementation\bexploit\t\bwell-known\b \ttati\ttical\btechnique\t\blike\bTF.IDF,\btogether\bwith\bautomatic\b PoS-Tagging\band\blingui\ttic\bfiltering\brule\t.\bThe\balgorithm\b ha\t\bbeen\bproved\bto\bprovide\bgood\bre\tult\t\bfor\bthe\bfollowing\b European\blanguage\t:\bEngli\th,\bFrench,\bGerman,\bItalian\band\b Spani\th.\b The\b algorithm\b i\t\b al\to\b capable\b of\b extracting\b multi-term\t\b keyword\t\b which\b have\b been\b proved\b to\b be\b much\b more\b de\tcriptive\bof\bthe\bdocument\bcontent\bthan\bmono-term\bone\t\b (Panunzi\bet\bal.,\b2006).\b LABLITA'\t\b keyword\b extractor\b algorithm\b ha\t\b been\b developed\b in\tide\b European\b Project\b AXMEDIS\b (Automating\b Production\b of\b Cro\t\t\b Media\b Content\b for\b Multi-channel\b Di\ttribution,\b IST-2-511299)\b and\b an\b implementation\bin\bC\f\f\bi\t\bnow\bpart\bof\bthe\bproject\bcontent\b proce\t\ting\binfra\ttructure.\b The\bimplementation\bexploit\t\ba\b\tet\bof\blingui\ttic\b\ttati\ttical\b reference\t\b and\b an\b external\b part\b of\b \tpeech\b tagger\b and\b lemmatizer:\ba\bcomplete\bde\tcription\bof\bthe\bimplementation\b can\bbe\bfound\bin\b(Panunzi\bet\bal.,\b2006)\band\b(Panunzi,\bFabbri,\b Moneglia,\b2006).\b DrStorage\b leverage\t\b a\b new\b Java\b implementation\b of\b the\b algorithm\b with\b updated\b \ttati\ttic\t\b and\b lingui\ttic\b rule\t\b for\b the\b\tupported\blanguage\t.\b DrStorage\bimplement\t\bal\to\ba\blanguage\bgue\t\ter,\bba\ted\bon\b the\bopen\b\tource\blibrary\bNGramJ\bfor\bautomatic\bextraction\b of\bdocument\t\blanguage.\b Every\b document\b that\b i\t\b \ttored\b in\b DrStorage'\t\b repo\titory\b pa\t\te\t\bthrough\ba\bcu\ttomizable\bproce\t\ting\bpipeline\bthat\bcan\b a\t\tign\b metadata,\b reformat\b the\b document,\b extract\b further\b information.\b The\b language\b gue\t\ter\b and\b the\b keyword\b extractor\bcan\bbe\bpart\bof\bthe\bproce\t\t,\b\to\btext\bdocument\t\bthat\b are\bproce\t\ted\bby\bthe\bpipeline\bhave\btheir\blanguage\bextracted\b and\ba\bli\tt\bof\bmulti-term\bkeyword\ba\t\tigned.\bAll\bthi\t\bproce\t\t\b goe\t\bwith\bno\bu\ter\binteraction,\bbut\bthe\b\ttarting\bcommand\bof\b putting\bthe\bdocument\bin\bthe\brepo\titory.\b Thi\t\b way,\b i\t\b very\b \timple\b to\b create\b a\b repo\titory\b with\b high-level\b metadata,\b \tuch\b a\t\b language\b and\b keyword\t:\b in\b figure\b 1,\b we\b can\b \tee\b a\b very\b \timple\b repo\titory\b built\b by\b importing\b a\b mailbox;\b the\b repo\titory\b i\t\b pre\tented\b with\b a\b common\bfile\ty\ttem\btree\blayout\bwhich\bcan\bbe\bexplored\bin\b the\bu\tual\bway,\bby\bopening\bfolder\t\band\b\tubfolder\t\band\bby\b double\bclicking\bon\bdocument\t\bto\bacce\t\t\bthem.\b With\bDrStorage\bit’\t\bnow\bea\ty\bto\b\tearch\bon\bdocument\t.\bIn\b figure\b 2\b it’\t\b \thown\b a\b typical\b \tearch\b dialog\b with\b which\b variou\t\bkind\bof\bquerie\t\bcan\bbe\b\bperformed;\bit’\t\bpo\t\tible\bto\b filter\b document\t\b of\b a\b \telected\b language\b only,\b to\b exploit\b keyword\t\b ju\tt\b by\b \tearching\b on\b them\b (re\tulting\b in\b a\bvery\b fa\tt\bquery\bwith\balmo\tt\bno\b“noi\te”\bre\tult\t)\bor\bby\bu\ting\bthem\b to\bboo\tt\bthe\brank\bpo\tition\bof\bcertain\bitem\t\bin\ba\bre\tult\b\tet.\b Figure\b3\bi\t\bgiven\ba\t\ban\bexample\bto\b\thow\bhow\bre\tult\t\bare\b pre\tented\b by\b the\b interface:\b the\b example\b \thow\b re\tult\t\b obtained\bquerying\bthe\b\timple\bword\b‘mobile’\b(a\t\b\thown\bin\b figure\b2)\bon\bthe\bmailbox\brepo\titory.\b

sections.title: 6. Cust\tm\bzat\b\tn
paragraphs: DrStorage\b i\t\b al\to\b ea\ty\b cu\ttomizable\b to\b di\tplay\b \tearch\b re\tult\t\b in\b other\b way\t\b than\b ju\tt\b li\tting.\b The\te\b new\bre\tult\t\b view\t\bcan\bhelp\bthe\bu\ter\bto\binfer\bnew\binformation\babout\bthe\b document\t\bin\bthe\brepo\titory.\b For\bexample,\bDrStorage\bprovide\t\ba\btimeline\bview\b(figure\b4)\b that\b exploit\t\b both\b \tearch\b re\tult\t\b and\b document\t\b time\b metadata,\bin\border\bto\b\tee\btemporal\btrend\t\bof\bquerie\t\bor\bfor\b keyword\t.\bThi\t\bview\bi\t\bdi\tplayed\ba\t\ba\bbar\bchart\bwith\bdate\t\b on\bthe\by-axi\t\band\b\tearch\bre\tult\t\bnumber\bon\bthe\bx-axi\t;\bthe\b view\bcan\bbe\bu\teful\bto\binfer\binformation\bon\bdocument\t\bfor\b which\bthe\btime\bmetadatum\bi\t\bimportant,\b\tuch\ba\t\bnew\t\bor\b Public\b Admini\ttration\b document\t\b or\b new\tgroup\t\b comment\t;\bat\ba\bglance,\bit\bi\t\bpo\t\tible\bto\bunder\ttand\bwhen\b new\tpaper\t\b had\b written\b about\b a\b certain\b event\b (verifying\b how\b many\b repercu\t\tion\t\b the\b event\b ha\t\b had\b in\b the\b next\b day\t),\b or\b if\b a\b certain\b topic\b ha\t\b been\b di\tcu\t\ted\b in\bweb\b forum\t\b (maybe\b for\b marketing\b monitoring),\b or\b to\b \tee\bif\b a\b Public\b Admini\ttration\b had\b treated\b an\b argument\b and\b with\b which\b“importance”\b(more\bdocument\t\babout\ban\bargument,\b more\bimportance\bthe\bPA\bgave\bto\bit).\b From\bthi\t\bview\bit’\t\b\timple\bto\bobtain\bdocument\t\bof\ba\bcertain\b day,\bby\b\timple\bdouble-clicking\bon\bthe\brelative\bbar.\b Another\b u\teful\b re\tult\b view\b i\t\b the\b keyword\b cloud\b view:\b given\ba\bre\tult\b\tet,\bthe\bview\b\thow\t\b(in\ba\bformat\bvery\b\timilar\b to\bcommon\btag-cloud)\bthe\bmore\bfrequent\bkeyword\t\bof\bthe\b document\t\b in\b the\b re\tult\b \tet.\b Keyword\b in\b thi\t\b ca\te\b are\b obtained\bwith\ba\b\timple\bTF.IDF\balgorithm\bwhich\bcompare\t\b only\bthe\bword\t\bcontained\bin\bthe\bdocument\t\brelative\t\bto\bthe\b day\bagain\tt\bthe\bword\t\bcontained\bin\bthe\bwhole\brepo\titory;\b the\bcloud\bmay\bdemon\ttrate\bthat\bdocument\t\bthat\bhave\bbeen\b found\b with\b a\b particular\b query,\b convey\b al\to\b information\b regarding\bother\btopic\t,\b\to\b\thowing\bcorrelation\t\bthat\bmight\b not\bbe\bevident\bwithout\ba\bdeep\banaly\ti\t\bof\beach\bdocument\bin\b the\b re\tult\b \tet.\b The\b keyword\b cloud\b can\b be\b di\tplayed\bby\b \timply\b right-clicking\b on\b a\b day-bar\b on\b the\b timeline\bview\b and\bchoo\ting\b‘Keyword\bCloud’\bfrom\bthe\bpop-up\bmenu.\bIn\b figure\b5,\bwe\bcan\b\tee\bwhich\bare\bthe\bmo\tt\bimportant\bword\t\bin\b the\bdocument\bof\bJuly\b9th

Panunzi,\b A.\b Fabbri,\b M.\b Moneglia,\b M.\b Zini,\b M.\b (2006)\b Multi-Term\b Keyword\t\b for\b Indexing\b Multilingual\b Textual\bRepo\titorie\t:\bDeveloping\bLanguage\bRe\tource\t\b and\b Algorithm\t,\b in\bProceedi\b\ts o\f AXMEDIS 2006 Co\b\fere\bce,\bDecember\b13-15,\bLeed\t,\bUK.\b

Panunzi,\b A.\b Fabbri,\b M.\b Moneglia,\b M.\b (2006)\b Integrating\b Method\t\b and\b LR\t\b for\b Automatic\b Keyword\b Extraction\b from\b Open-Domain\b Text\t,\b in\bProceedi\b\ts o\f LREC 2006 Co\b\fere\bce,\bMay\b24-26,\bGenova.\b

Panunzi,\b A.\b Fabbri,\b M.\b Moneglia,\b M.\b (2005)\b Keyword\b Extraction\b in\b Open-Domain\b Multilingual\b Textual\b Re\tource\t,\b in\bProceedi\b\ts o\f 1st I\bter\batio\bal Co\b\fere\bce o\b Automated Productio\b o\f Cross Media Co\bte\bt \for Multi-cha\b\bel Distributio\b\b (AXMEDIS\b 2005),\bIEEE\bComputer\bSociety.\b
